entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
